forbidden.description: You do not have permission to access this page.
forbidden.title: Access denied

globalError.description: Don't worry, this can happen. You can try again or return to the homepage.
globalError.title: Something went wrong

notFound.description: The page you are looking for is not available. It has either been removed or moved to a new location.
notFound.title: Page not found

unauthorized.description: You need to authenticate to access this page. Please sign in.
unauthorized.title: Access denied
